home.title: Home
home.description: Onlinemat is the material management and lending platform for all Jungschar groups and Cevi departments. Browse the available materials in your department and reserve them directly online. Each department manages its own materials, locations, and members. Looking for something your department doesn't have? Use the search to find materials from other departments that have enabled sharing.
home.welcome: Welcome {{name}}, you can get started now.

reserve.title: Reserve online
reserve.description: Reserve materials with just a few clicks and keep track of your orders at any time.

search.title: Cross-department search
search.description: Find materials from other departments that have enabled sharing - perfect when you need something extra.
